nodes.text: Hi there, I didn't expect to see you here.
I did not come here to see you, so vhy vould you expect to see me here in first place? I did not expect to see you, either.
Um... what I meant to say is that I'm happy to see you here.
Ah, is good seeing you, too.
So you caught all those Drats? Wasn't that a bit dangerous? It seems odd that someone like you would be killing Drats.
And vot do you mean by 'someone like me?'
I meant that.. um.. I didn't know that someone as pretty as you and in such a nice dress would go around killing Drats.
(Shrug) Is good vay to get money to buy things for class.
No matter what you do, you really look great. Even after just killing Drats, you are as cute as anyone I've ever met.
Heh, flattery vill not catch Drats. Vill take more than vords to vin hearts, Shawn.
I'm about to go hunting Drats - would you like to join me?
I have hunted enough today. Good hunting to you, and good evening.
Don't worry, Esme. Gregor is right - you're too good to leave this school. Things will work out.
I try very hard to be Disbarred Bard in class, but test had so many vords that I did not know. I did not finish it.
It was only the first test of the class. I'm sure that won't be the last. You'll do better next time.

nodes.message: Shawn agreed to help Esme after speaking to her in the Practice Room

nodes.text: I told you before, I'm going to help you.

options.text: Tell Esme You Talked to Gerhard

nodes.text: I'm sure you can work something out if you just go talk to Master von Urwald. He's not as nasty as he seems.
I vill try talking to him. I vorked hard to get to go to this school. I do not vant to fail.

options.text: Tell Esme that Thomas Will Help Her

nodes.text: Just remember, Thomas wants to help you, too. So you can have all the help you need.
Thank you, Shawn. Is good to know I have friends.
Don't worry yourself, Esme. I'll be happy to help you on the tests.
I seem to recall that you did not do so vell on test, yourself.
Oh, well, I'll do better next time.
Thank you, Shawn. Maybe vith help, I can do better.
I'm impressed at how well you hunt Drats... what's your secret to catching so many without getting hurt?
I, uh, use vays of my people to hunt. Ve are very good hunters.
Would you like to go hunting with me?
No. Is late and I vill need to go study before I go to sleep tonight. Good hunting to you.
So you've been exploring the Wine Cellars again. Find anything interesting besides the 'Dangerous' door?

nodes.name: Dangerous Doors Indeed
nodes.description: Esme was curious about the "Very Dangerous" door in the Wine Cellar, and so am I. I'd really like to see what's behind that door...

nodes.text: I have found that Drats like to hide things in their nests that they pick up from other places. I have a nice bracelet that I have found buried in bottom of nest.
Sometimes, it is worth digging to find treasure.
So what do you think is behind the 'Dangerous" door?
I am not sure, but I agree with Gregor that it is dangerous. My hair rises when I go near door, which I know is bad sign. I am afraid of what is behind door.
I do not like being afraid of unknown monsters. I vant to look my fears in the eyes and go for their throat.
Did you know that you were unanimously voted, "Person I'd most like to adventure in dangerous dungeons with" in a recent study of dating patterns of young Rogues?
You are very silly person, Shawn. Silly yes, but also sweet.
So, would you like to go hunting with me in the Wine Cellar now? We won't be going anywhere near that very fascinating Dangerous Door or find out what really is on the other side.
I vould very much like to hunt vith you novhere near tha Dangerous door sometime, but not tonight. I need to go get cleaned up. Some other time, maybe so?
I'll look forward to it.
